captain.name: RD Gaikwad
captain.reason: Consistent performer, has been scoring runs consistently. Good form and high potential for a big score.

fantasy_team.name: RD Gaikwad
fantasy_team.reason: Top-order batter with a good average and consistent run-scorer; important for a batting-friendly pitch.

fantasy_team.name: DP Conway
fantasy_team.reason: Good average, consistent performer as opener. Can provide solid runs at the top.

fantasy_team.name: S Dube
fantasy_team.reason: Aggressive middle-order batter who can also contribute with wickets. Provides value in both departments.

fantasy_team.name: SA Yadav
fantasy_team.reason: Experienced batter. High scoring potential on a batting pitch.

fantasy_team.name: HH Pandya
fantasy_team.reason: Key all-rounder for MI, reliable with both bat and ball. Can pick up wickets and score crucial runs.

fantasy_team.name: Ishan Kishan
fantasy_team.reason: Aggressive opener, capable of exploiting powerplay overs. Valuable runs at the top of the order and wicketkeeping points.

fantasy_team.name: RA Jadeja
fantasy_team.reason: Valuable all-rounder, economical bowler, and handy lower-order batter. Consistent performer.

fantasy_team.name: JJ Bumrah
fantasy_team.reason: Key bowler for MI, high wicket-taking potential, and economical. A must-have in the bowling attack.

fantasy_team.name: Mustafizur Rahman
fantasy_team.reason: Experienced bowler with variations, can pick up wickets at crucial stages. Good economy.

fantasy_team.name: M Pathirana
fantasy_team.reason: Young bowler with raw pace, wicket-taking ability, and has taken multiple 5-wicket hauls.

fantasy_team.name: R Ravindra
fantasy_team.reason: Provides a good balance of batting and bowling. Has shown potential and consistency.

vice_captain.name: HH Pandya
vice_captain.reason: Key all-rounder, expected to contribute with both bat and ball. Can score runs and pick up wickets.
